1594974805_1G79HnSxfCixN2HD2jP1Zabs1B8xz.body: You know what? I'm glad this was the only aftermath of the hack, a few Bitcoins lost. I kinda get why you'd think this discredits Bitcoin, to the common public it's viewed as a tool for scammers (unfortunately used a lot by them) and lawmakers can leverage this to impose restrictions and prevent access. But after all, it's just a medium of currency that happens to be misused
